name: fondled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
fondle
to touch gently and in a loving way, or to touch in a sexual way: She fondled the puppies. He gently fondled the baby's feet. She accused him of fondling her (= touching her in a sexual way) in the back of a taxi. Synonyms
caress
pet Compare
pat verb
